Group hierarchy: AWS Pricing Calculator provides only an estimate of your AWS fees and doesn't include any taxes that might apply. Your actual fees depend on a variety of factors, including your actual usage of AWS services.

Rationale - Cost reduction was done by eliminating redundancy means there could be failure of points in the application and outages. Redundant load balancers and DB nodes were removed. Also EC2 instance saving plan was accepted for 1 year to reduce the cost.
